fields.name: limit_wrong_inputs
fields.description: The maximum number of times an user can introduce a wrong input

fields.name: limit_wrong_requests
fields.description: The maximum number of times a contributor can reply wrongly an extra information request

fields.name: gurlshortener_api_name
fields.description: Name of the Google URL Shortener API.

fields.name: gurlshortener_api_version
fields.description: Version number of the Google URL shortener API.

fields.name: gurlshortener_api_url
fields.description: URL of the Google URL shortener API.

fields.name: short_url
fields.description: Boolean value that indicates whether the url posted by the app needs to be shortener.
